article_title: The NU Interview: Lexington CEO Jeremy Johnson
article_text:
Jeremy Johnson

Lexington Insurance President and CEO Jeremy Johnson radiates a relaxed enthusiasm that reflects the insurer’s success in responding to market needs, as well as its consistent reputation among producers. In Denver during the annual RIMS conference, Executive Managing Editor Shawn Moynihan sat down with Johnson to discuss Lexington’s progress one year after he took the helm.

What are some of the inroads Lexington has made in the past year under your watch that you’re particularly proud of, and what are some of the market areas that exhibit real growth potential as we reach the midpoint of this year?

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Shawn Moynihan, PropertyCasualty360.com
article_metadata.description: The President/CEO of Lexington Insurance discusses the insurer’s inroads in the past year, developing new coverage solutions and how science and technology are driving its progress.
